content: hello everyone why lock here thanks for joining me this is the greatest snack
and maybe invention in the history of mankind the Saturn 5 rocket the wheel
and these Totino's pizza rolls sadly we're in a bit of a national crisis
because so many people don't know how to properly cook these today I'm going to
show you the right way to prepare and enjoy a Totino's pizza roll first
stumble upstairs in the dead of night cuz you've been making under dark tiles
for the past twenty three can hours fish them out of the freezer pick them back
up go open the bag and we'll move on to the next step alright first let's look
at this ridiculousness on the bag because this is the wrong way to do it
pre-heat to 425 put them evenly on a pan and then put it in the oven and cook
accordingly wrong wrong don't do it this way first
of all we're not building a touring machine here just put them on the pan
it's fine they're gonna cook the same it doesn't matter then start the oven 425
is the right number that much the bag does get right so set it up there hit
start this does not vary between ovens and then pop them immediately in the
oven don't wait so while the preheating is
going on they go into the oven and set your timer for 12 to 14 minutes I was a
bit ambitious here I was cocky I said it for 14 ended up being a bit too much but
not too bad as we'll see in a moment when there's half a minute left jump the
gun turn on the oven light and check them out if there's anything lose oh boy
I got blasted alright these went probably a minute too long basically you
want to pull them out as soon as any of the inside stuff starts to squeeze out
this isn't too bad here but again the key is as soon as one of them starts to
ooze out then they're all done those go ahead and dump them on the plate here
make lots of noise wake up your wife or your husband which is what happened when
I made this video put it in the sink to take care of in the morning because it
does have to soak and then I'm gonna probably get rid of some of these that
exploded and then we'll go on back down to the shop
mmm those are coming out nice I'm gonna set those aside to rest give the tannins
than the marinara some time to mature I find that about four and a half
minutes after withdrawal from the oven is the perfect sweet spot between heat
and cohesiveness and now the rubber meets the road you take the pizza roll
you bite off one corner mmm the taste is good but the texture you'll notice a
certain elasticity because it's not a hardened shell it's not crispy but it's
also perfectly cooked it's still very hot it's not dissimilar from elegant
techniques such as sous-vide the French method of low-temperature vacuum-sealed
cooking bite off the other corner mm-hmm what we've done now is create a vent
squeeze on both ends and this has allows latent heat to come out the middle and
from there you can enjoy well hopefully we've all learned a little something
here today I am why lock thank you for joining me and I'll see you next time
[Applause]
